title: Hybrid Encryption-Based e-Learning Security Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic network security concepts and encryption principles, with foundational programming skills
context.additional_context: Practical training on enhancing multimedia content security for language domain applications.

learning_goals: Participants can design an e-learning content protection system using a hybrid encryption system (RSA-AES).
Participants can implement a process to verify data integrity by combining the BCIE compression algorithm and SCELL encryption technology.
Participants can develop and evaluate a security-enhanced e-learning platform prototype through project-based team collaboration.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
